title: (2120-092) Salvaterra de Magos - 201 N118
description: Easy access direct from N 118 main road inside small town, with flat illuminated and free P without shadows and free service area. Picnic tables on bottom. Inside town so several shopping and supermarket around. If you like bullfighting, here is main event; also works with hawks (search “Falcoaria Real”). The area is safe but noisy mainly in working days as just aside main road and also main roundpoint with many trucks traffic. For quiet overnight, choose “Cais da Vala Real” near small marina (1,2 km N top of town).

name: Cais da Vala Real
title: (2120) Cais da Vala Real
description: Flat illuminated free gravel parking at opposite site of small marina and small arm of Tejo river. Quiet for overnight. No shadows. No services.

title: (2120-097) Salvaterra de Magos - Unnamed Road

title: (2120-013) Salvaterra de Magos -

Once a week: butcher and fishmonger. Cash machine. Pets accepted. If booking a minimum of one week, we take you to the supermarket for free for your purchases. Possibility to rent a kitchen tent with two pieces of furniture and an induction hob for a minimum of one week.

title: (2130) Santo Estevão - Unnamed Road

description: A quiet place in a parking space near the Tagus with a stunning view of the city of Lisbon and the Vasco da Gama bridge

title: (2140) Cantarinhas - Unnamed Road
description: I spent at ease with my 10T, 3 days in the pampas without seeing a cat;]

title: (2890-014) Alcochete -
description: Parking where we stayed one night without any difficulty. calm. 1 hour from Lisbon.

title: (2985) Canha - A13
description: Nice Resting Area aside of the Gas Station, trees for shadow and calm air

title: (2890) Alcochete -
description: Very nice place next to the beach and the park. I drove here at 2 at night because the other spot on park4night was very noisy on a Friday. That was a good decision.

title: (2040-481) Asseiceira -
description: Nice picnic spot. 8 flat paved parking spaces. Water tap accessible with a long hose. On a very noisy country road, currently due to diversion.

name: Quinta Lusco-Fusco
title: (2890) Quinta Lusco-Fusco
description: Quinta Lusco-Fusco is a private rural farm lets stay overnight for travelers by van, tent, bike, backpack, camping under the stars, in the shade of the cork oak, listening to the birds, seeing the farm animals. It is just 30 minutes from Lisbon. Only cold shower. Call before arrival.

title: (2580) Alenquer - 14 Rua Principal
description: Small water fountain in the city. easy access. good jet for filling water hacks.

title: (2890-167) Alcochete - 185 Avenida Infante D.João
description: Beach overlooking Lisbon. A beach bar, showers and foot baths, sports equipment and free wi fi. Place where to park the motorhome 50 m from the beach. I think there will be no problem with the overnight stay. This area should be avoided from the 9th to the 16th of August, at least for parking or overnight accommodation of vehicles that can cause traffic problems, since at that time the festivities of the land (parties of Barrete Verde) take place. Moreover, they can park in the surroundings and go to the party by other means, since they are very beautiful and traditional parties. In June, the parrot festival takes place on this beach.

title: (2890) Alcochete - 259 Rua Cerradinho da Praia
description: Parking near park at night closed, safe place for van

name: Stopover Carvoeira Motorhome
title: (2565) Stopover Carvoeira Motorhome
description: Campervan Area Ecopark da Serra de São Julião

title: (2890-167) Alcochete - 92 Rua das Descobertas
description: Alcochete, Portugal, Free Park,, No Service Area

title: (2550-368) DaMinhaCasa Park - Cadaval - Rua fonte do Telheiro - Murteira
title_short: (2550-368) DaMinhaCasa Park - Cadaval - Rua fonte do Telheiro - Murteira
description: Country house with a beautiful view of the Montejunto mountain, offers parking for motorhomes, caravans and tents. Allows contact with nature: space with animals such as chickens and goats. Possibility to purchase homemade products such as cheese, eggs and bread. Our motto is: "Happiness is in the simple things"

title: (2565) Dois Portos - 56 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Fountain with water. Canisters have a lot of space, the water jet is also so that they can be filled quickly. And a small nice café next door.

title: (2870-145) Alcochete - Unnamed Road
description: More natural car park than the others in the city, on the banks of the river next to the marsh area, view of the capital. No amenities, very good internet network for telecommuting... No one in the off-season, perfect for a quiet night or two.

title: (2565-206) Dois Portos - 67 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Cosy outdoor kitchen with picknick tables, fireplace and a sink combined. toilet as well.

title: (2660) Santo Antão do Tojal -
description: Quiet place near the wind turbines. Only   accessible for small/medium vans. Good 4G Vodafone, Meo and Nos

title: (2550-012) Alguber - R. Mapril Fogaca
description: Flat free parking, a lot of space in a magical small village

title: (2890-532) Alcochete - Praia das Salinas
description:
Perfect to stand here overlooking the bridge, sandy bottom but lots of firm spots. Access is a bit bumpy for a very short distance but. We are standing here with a length of 8m, no problem.
Perfect for a night or two free standing. Beach, sand, peace and view. What more do you want.

title: () Santarém - Unnamed Road
description: Here you can stand 4x4 in the riverbed, close to the water or up next to the path where it can be Dusty but if cars drive past. On the weekend possibly heavily visited by the locals. Our stay mid oct during the week was very pleasantly quiet.

title: (2870) Atalaia - 52 Rua dos Círios
description: Quiet parking for one night behind the church. So hard to find a place in the area. The church bells start ringing at 7:00 a.m. every 15 minutes.

name: Casa HNobre
title: (2000-736) Casa HNobre
description:
Private place to park a Van or Motorhome (<6m and 2m high) day 
or night. Water and electricity provided. 
Free WiFi. 
Swimming pool.
Wonderful sunset to enjoy and relax.

title: (2870) Atalaia - Escadaria do Adro da Igreja
title_short: (2870) Atalaia - Escadaria do Adro da Igreja
description: Large quiet parking (we were alone) facing the church.  Behind houses but not far from the road.  Away but not isolated so perfect for a night of rest.  Wc closed at night

title: (2590) - 10 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Personal park for 5/6 motorhomes. We have friendly dogs. PLEASE CALL BEFORE ARRIVING.

title: (2870) Atalaia - 2127 N4
description: Large empty parking lot at night. we spent the night there without any worries you have trash cans available.

title: (2670-732) Fanhões - Estrada das Ribas
description:
Place to spend the night next to a park surrounded by nature. The area is level, shaded and silent. The park has many activities in nature for children and adults with zip lines and steps between trees.

Please note: you cannot stay overnight inside the large parking area of the park

title: (2665-307) Milharado - R. Anselmo Manuel Carreira
description: Nice little park to eat! It's clean, there's shade and a small cafe next door if needed.

title: (2550) Cadaval - 20 Rua das Castanholas
description: Nice launderette, free WiFi available. Nearby is a park with playground.

title: (2670) Fanhões - Rua da Sociedade Recreativa
description: Several locations available on dirt roads in good condition therefore passable. Set back from the road so very quiet.

title: (2870-087) Montijo - 135 Avenida Dom Afonso v
description: A full service laundry even with ironing. As of now, free parking “behind” the building

title: (2670) Fanhões -
description: Small spot at the top of a plateau. Be careful it climbs hard and with the stones it skids but there is a parking lot at the top with a handicapped place. Quiet night, waking up in the morning with hunters in the distance and a few passages of quads. Nice view, especially at night with the lights of the surrounding towns, despite the wind turbines in the distance.

title: (2025) Tremês - 17 Rua de Santiago
description: Free Water and air for the tires available, next to a bakery, cafe, gas station and car wash

title: (2890) Samouco - Acesso à Área de Serviço de Alcochete
title_short: (2890) Samouco - Acesso à Área de Serviço de Alcochete
description: Gas station Galp next to the Vasco de Gama bridge with a King burguer with rich breakfasts, picnic area, free showers and clean and spacious bathrooms. The bathrooms close from 22: 00-7: 30. You can park next to the showers and bathrooms. Possibility of refilling water from the gas station. ideal for a night. In the vicinity there is nothing special.

address.street: Acesso à Área de Serviço de Alcochete

title: (1990) Lisboa - Rua Chen He
description: Small parking lot next to a skate park, pump track and fitness area. Right under the big bridge. Nice atmosphere right next to a park.

title: (2565) Runa - 99 Rua da Liberdade
description: Brand new car park.

title: (1990) Sacavém - Passeio do Teja
description: Large parking lot without lines. flat and sunny. we stayed 3 months, it does not bother anyone, we were safe and it's calm. Very close fountain, and garbage cans collected every day. very clean and well maintained park. if you are at the bottom of the parking lot, you can receive the tennis wifi. bus line 708 at the foot of the parking lot to reach the metro. BE CAREFUL for the route, put the roundabout otherwise the gps will take you over the bridge !! by 12m bus KarasGo family route's

title: (1990) Lisboa - Caminho das Cegonhas
description: Paid parking under overpass. Next to skatepark, water tap for drinking at the skatepark. Local make out spot so a lot of coming and going

title: (1990-513) Lisboa - n.º 1 Rua Chen He
description: Perfect for visiting Lisbon, spent 3 nights there easily, it's quiet. Good alternative to the parking lot next door under the bridge, where a lot of people hang out at the weekend. Bus stop directly at the parking lot. Completely free on weekday nights and Saturday-Sunday.

title: (2870-327) Montijo - 2870 Via Circular do Montijo
description: Repsol gas station with good LPG price. You can also buy a Propane Bottle here.

title: (1990) Sacavém - Passeio dos Heróis do Mar
title_short: (1990) Sacavém - Passeio dos Heróis do Mar
description: Good spot to land, lots of space for animals, several free parking at the edge of the park.

title: (2665) Milharado - 42 Avenida de Portugal
description: Parking of the public park of Póvoa da galega, right in the middle of the village by the library and close to several stores. ok for a night or two.

title: (2685-021) Sacavém - 15A Rua José Luís de Morais
title_short: (2685-021) Sacavém - 15A Rua José Luís de Morais
description:
laundry service
dryer

title: (2670) Lousa -
description: Small spot on the side of the road, quiet! Next to a nice ruined castle to "visit" very quickly! We didn't sleep there, but there was no sign prohibiting it.

title: (2565) Maxial - 1 Rua Bartolomeu Perestrelo
description: Quiet place in a dead end street in front of it are some parking spaces. I had a quiet night. At the edge of the forest where you can go for a nice walk. Playground is there too.

title: (1990-503) Sacavém - 19 Passeio das Gáveas
description: Authorized parking, quiet and safe place near the police station

title: (1990-385) Lisboa - N10 Passeio dos Jacarandás
description: Good place to spend the night. Very shady. Very quiet bar. Some supermarket nearby. Right next to the Teixo River promenade, where you can picnic, walk, do some exrcise...Riverfront restaurants 10-15 min away on foot.

title: (1990) Sacavém - 46 Rua Príncipe Mónaco
description: I have stayed in this place next to another motorhome. It is a quiet place and close to bus stop.

title: (2665-335) Milharado - 9 Rua da Ermida
description: Water tank tap (probably no drinking water) with Gardena connection available and toilet on a large square with gas station and bus parking available.

title: (2890) Samouco - 15 Rua da Praia
description: Free parking in front of the small fishing port. View of Tejo and Vasco da Gama Bridge. No service. Good for a night.

title: (1990) Lisboa - Travessa Sindbad O Marinheiro
description: Parking between residences. A temporary solution, much quieter than under the bridge to the North. Slight slope

title: (2670) Lousa - Rua Dom Manuel I
description: Flat land near a point of view. Very nice view around. Warning: very steep access on asphalt road, then arrived at the top we are on a dirt road that is muddy in case of rain. Road downhill so a little noisy.

title: (2040) Rio Maior - 6B Avenida Paulo VI
description: Quiet place at night and on weekends. Safe and surrounded by sports facilities. Flat floor and if you park where indicated, you have a view of the stadium lawn. Next to a picnic area and the training center.

title: (2040) Rio Maior - 67 Avenida Doutor Mário Soares
title_short: (2040) Rio Maior - 67 Avenida Doutor Mário Soares
description: Quiet place at night and on weekends. Safe and surrounded by sports facilities. During school time, throughout the day, there is the normal movement of the students. Flat floor and if you park where indicated, you have a view of the stadium lawn.

title: (2040) Rio Maior - Avenida Doutor Mário Soares
title_short: (2040) Rio Maior - Avenida Doutor Mário Soares
description: Small parking at the indoor and outdoor pool. Normal street noise during the day, calm and lit at night. Pubelles, tap on a tennis court. No emptying! Toilets in the entrance area of the swimming pool. Intermarket 300m.

title: (2870) Montijo - E90
description: Parking at the Forum Montijo shopping center. With all the facilities of a shopping center a few steps away (like the Continente supermarket and pharmacies).

title: (2670-457) Loures - Avenida Descobertas
description:
Next to shopping center.
Nice spot to spend the night.

title: (2670) Lousa - Autoestrada do Oeste
description: Rest area of a Repsol gas station. There are 4 large squares, quite well leveled. Perfect for an overnight en route.

title: (2670) Lousa - IC1
description: Station service avec douche

title: (2870) Montijo - 79 Rua Miguel Pais
description: Car park right by the river and at Montijo downtown. Restaurants, bars and other services close by.

title: (2565) Ramalhal - 14 Rua das Figueiras
description: drinking water fountain

title: (2565-587) Outeiro da Cabeça - 1 Rua do Pavilhão Gimnodesportivo
title_short: (2565-587) Outeiro da Cabeça - 1 Rua do Pavilhão Gimnodesportivo
description: Small area for 2 motorhomes to not be tight, not very nice, but free with the classic services, water by tap push and small flow.

title: (1990-221) Lisboa - 308 Passeio Adamastor
description: A laundromat on the corner, see pictures for prices

title: (1990-108) Lisboa - 2.03 Alameda dos Oceanos
description: Another laundromat. cheaper than the other.

title: (1800) Lisboa - Estrada de São Cornélio
description: Parking near the cemetery, perfect for overnight, very quiet, in the morning park cars from the offices, is 15 minutes walk from the oceanarium. In the park of the nations.

title: (2040-153) Fráguas - R. Principal
description: Small picnic area with barbecue available and fountain with several drinking water taps. WC but which was locked today

title: (2985) Pegões - 388 N4
description: Free parking. Bar next to the parking. Good for 1 night. Tip the security guard or buy a beer. Relatively quiet. Lorry and camper van parking.

title: (2870) Montijo - D Estrada do Seixalinho
description: Huge parking near ferry terminal to Lisbon and military airport.

title: (1950-323) Lisbon - I Rua Cintura do Porto
title_short: (1950-323) Lisbon - I Rua Cintura do Porto
description: Parking lot by the river in an industrial area.

title: (2670-339) Loures - EN 250 Quinta Casal da Pipa
title_short: (2670-339) Loures - EN 250 Quinta Casal da Pipa
description: Ein bescheidener Ort, um die Nacht ohne Probleme zu verbringen. Es ist im Park auf dem Festland.

title: (1950) Lisboa - R Cintura do Porto
description: No facilities but great place for spending night/few nights. Right on the walking/jogging promenade and bus stop. Ocean view with low/high tide, bar with snacks nearby, about 2 kms to Oceanarium by foot.

title: (2985) Pegões - Rua António Luís Fidalgo
description:
Quinta Dalhia welcomes you.
25 minutes from Lisbon and the sea.
Approaching National 4.
In large private house with large wooded park, swimming pool and bathroom available.
Rent pitches for camping car 3 or 4 max.
most: welcome and sympathy.

Possibility laundry with supplement.
contact Jacques by phone
address Quinta Dalhia
street Antonio Luis fidalgo
alfonso
2985 -000 Pegeos

title: (2040-133) Rio Maior - 39 Estrada das Salinas
description: Parking in Las Salinas, on the right side there is a parking lot in the shelter of the trees, with bathrooms. There is a restaurant nearby and small cabins that offer drinks and food. We arrived at the last minute and there was hardly anyone else. Recommended if you are in the Park and looking for a place to spend the night.

title: (1700) Lisboa - Rua A
description: Parking P6 long duration. Underground and open air. We stayed here for 2 nights. Ideal to party in Lisbon without worrying about our van and return early in the morning with the first metro or night bus 208 leaving Cais de Sobré. Toilets and catering at the airport (3 min walk)

title: (2040) Rio Maior - 69 Estrada das Salinas
description:
Salinas de Rio Maior. Large gravel car park almost flat. 100m from the village, the saltworks and the shops. Very quiet night despite the proximity of the road, but not very busy at night.
Very typical village with its wooden houses and its very rare "terrestrial" saltworks. I also recommend the Solar do Sal Restaurant and its excellent Portuguese-style chicken at very moderate prices in a beautiful rustic setting. The owner is very friendly and speaks French. I recommend

title: (1700-111) Lisboa - Av. Berlim
description: P3 guarded car park with flat and shaded spaces. No problem with our 3m high van. 15 euros for 24 hours. Metro for Lisbon 5 minutes walk from the car park for 1.50e. Beware of many thefts in broad daylight of motorhomes on car parks at 3 euros without surveillance.

title: (2620-091) Póvoa de Santo Adrião - 4 Largo Igreja
title_short: (2620-091) Póvoa de Santo Adrião - 4 Largo Igreja
description: It’s a small dirt parking spot with a laundromat across the street. The wash-salon has free wifi and TV available. Clean and well kept. There is also a machine inside to change money. Not suitable for large CC only vans.

title: (2000) Pernes -
description: Parking next to a school. A little movement to be next to a national road.

title: (1950-074) Lisboa - 19 Rua Norte Júnior
description: Area where parking is tolerated by RV’s and caravans, near bus station

title: (1950) Lisboa - 23 Rua Cintura do Porto
description: Parking by the docks, quiet, no height limitation.

title: (2565) Ramalhal - Autoestrada do Oeste
description: Rest area, safe place to sleep during the travel

title: (2560) Torres Vedras - Estrada Nó de Ligação A8
title_short: (2560) Torres Vedras - Estrada Nó de Ligação A8
description: LPG / GPL gas station. Has adapter for German gas tanks (does NOT fill gas bottles). Additionally washing machines and dryers.

title: (2560-295) Torres Vedras - 1 Rua António Augusto Cabral
title_short: (2560-295) Torres Vedras - 1 Rua António Augusto Cabral
description: Quiet parking in the limits of a small city called Torres Vedras, no need to pay, but not a place where you can bring your table and chairs
